remarks: If an ordered triple represents a simple path of length 2, its components are vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Mar-2018.)
statement: 2spthonot3v $p |- ( T e. ( A ( V 2SPathOnOt E ) C ) -> ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( A e. V /\ C e. V ) /\ T e. ( ( V X. V ) X. V ) ) ) $.
